page.title: 14Sway.
page.content: Sway Welfare Aid Group (S.W.A.G.) was formed several years ago to raise money for the sick and needy and to help with transport to hospital, Meals on Wheels, etc. for the elderly. They organise an annual Boule event in the grounds of Sway Place, one of two nursing homes in the village. Sway is twinned with Brettville, a small village near to Le Havre, France. The Mayor of Brettville came to the Boule event in 1984. This year 15 villagers from Brettville spent a weekend in Sway, and a group of Sway villagers are planning a return visit soon.
